title: Secretary Jennifer Granholm & Sen. Roger Wicker Sunday On “This Week with George Stephanopoulos"
body: This is a listing for "This Week" airing Sunday, April 11, 2021. Energy Secretary(R) Mississippi. . . . . . . . . . . . . . .ABC News Chief Justice CorrespondentABC News Chief Legal AnalystHost & Legal Analyst,  "Law & Crime". . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .(D) Former New Jersey GovernorABC News Contributor(D) Former Chicago MayorABC News ContributorABC News Congressional CorrespondentThe New York Times Washington Correspondent. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
